verses.verse: For, behold, <WH2009> the Lord, <WH113> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> does take <WH5493> away <WH5493> from Jerusalem <WH3389> and from Judah <WH3063> the stay <WH4937> and the staff, <WH4938> the whole <WH3605> stay <WH8172> of bread, <WH3899> and the whole <WH3605> stay <WH4937> of water. <WH4325>
The mighty <WH1368> man, <WH376> and the man of war, <WH4421> the judge, <WH8199> and the prophet, <WH5030> and the prudent, <WH7080> and the ancient, <WH2204>
The captain <WH8269> of fifty, <WH2572> and the honorable <WH5375> <WH6440> man, and the counselor, <WH3289> and the cunning <WH2450> artificer, <WH2796> and the eloquent <WH995> orator. <WH3908>
And I will give <WH5414> children <WH5288> to be their princes, <WH8269> and babes <WH8586> shall rule <WH4910> over them.

And the people <WH5971> shall be oppressed, <WH5065> every <WH376> one <WH376> by another, and every <WH376> one <WH376> by his neighbor: <WH7453> the child <WH5288> shall behave <WH7292> himself proudly <WH7292> against the ancient, <WH2204> and the base <WH7034> against the honorable. <WH3519>

When <WH3588> a man <WH376> shall take <WH8610> hold <WH8610> of his brother <WH251> of the house <WH1004> of his father, <WH1> saying, You have clothing, <WH8071> be you our ruler, <WH7101> and let this <WH2063> ruin <WH4384> be under <WH8478> your hand: <WH3027>

In that day <WH3117> shall he swear, <WH5375> saying, <WH559> I will not be an healer; <WH2280> for in my house <WH1004> is neither <WH369> bread <WH3899> nor <WH369> clothing: <WH8071> make <WH7760> me not a ruler <WH7101> of the people. <WH5971>

For Jerusalem <WH3389> is ruined, <WH3782> and Judah <WH3063> is fallen: <WH5307> because <WH3588> their tongue <WH3956> and their doings <WH4611> are against <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> to provoke <WH4784> the eyes <WH5869> of his glory. <WH3519>

The show <WH1971> of their countenance <WH6440> does witness <WH5707> against them; and they declare <WH5046> their sin <WH2403> as Sodom, <WH5467> they hide <WH3582> it not. Woe <WH188> to their soul! <WH5315> for they have rewarded <WH1580> evil <WH7451> to themselves. <WH1992>
Say <WH559> you to the righteous, <WH6662> that it shall be well <WH2896> with him: for they shall eat <WH398> the fruit <WH6529> of their doings. <WH4611>
Woe <WH188> to the wicked! <WH7563> it shall be ill <WH7451> with him: for the reward <WH1576> of his hands <WH3027> shall be given <WH6213> him.

As for my people, <WH5971> children <WH5768> are their oppressors, <WH5065> and women <WH802> rule <WH4910> over them. O my people, <WH5971> they which lead <WH833> you cause you to err, <WH8582> and destroy <WH1104> the way <WH1870> of your paths. <WH734>
The LORD <WH3068> stands <WH5324> up to plead, <WH7378> and stands <WH5975> to judge <WH1777> the people. <WH5971>

The LORD <WH3068> will enter <WH935> into judgment <WH4941> with the ancients <WH2204> of his people, <WH5971> and the princes <WH8269> thereof: for you have eaten <WH398> up the vineyard; <WH3754> the spoil <WH1500> of the poor <WH6041> is in your houses. <WH1004>
What <WH4100> mean you that you beat <WH1792> my people <WH5971> to pieces, and grind <WH2912> the faces <WH6440> of the poor? <WH6041> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> of hosts. <WH6635>

Moreover the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> Because <WH3282> <WH3588> the daughters <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726> are haughty, <WH1361> and walk <WH3212> with stretched <WH5186> forth necks <WH1627> and wanton <WH8265> eyes, <WH5869> walking <WH1980> and mincing <WH2952> as they go, <WH3212> and making a tinkling <WH5913> with their feet: <WH7272>

Therefore the LORD <WH136> will smite <WH5596> with a scab <WH5596> the crown <WH6936> of the head <WH6936> of the daughters <WH1323> of Zion, <WH6726> and the LORD <WH3068> will discover <WH6168> their secret <WH6596> parts.

In that day <WH3117> the Lord <WH136> will take <WH5493> away <WH5493> the bravery <WH8597> of their tinkling ornaments <WH5914> about their feet, and their cauls, <WH7636> and their round <WH7720> tires <WH7720> like the moon,
The chains, <WH5188> and the bracelets, <WH8285> and the mufflers, <WH7479>
The bonnets, <WH6287> and the ornaments <WH6807> of the legs, <WH6807> and the headbands, <WH7196> and the tablets, <WH1004> <WH5315> and the earrings, <WH3908>
The rings, <WH2885> and nose <WH639> jewels, <WH5141>
The changeable <WH4254> suits <WH2470> of apparel, <WH4254> and the mantles, <WH4595> and the wimples, <WH4304> and the crisping <WH2754> pins,
The glasses, <WH1549> and the fine linen, <WH5466> and the hoods, <WH6797> and the veils. <WH7289>

And it shall come <WH1961> to pass, that instead <WH8478> of sweet <WH1314> smell <WH1314> there shall be stink; <WH4716> and instead <WH8478> of a girdle <WH2290> a rent; <WH5364> and instead <WH8478> of well <WH4639> set hair <WH4748> baldness; <WH7144> and instead <WH8478> of a stomacher <WH6614> a girding <WH4228> of sackcloth; <WH8242> and burning <WH3587> instead <WH8478> of beauty. <WH3308>
Your men <WH4962> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> and your mighty <WH1369> in the war. <WH4421>
And her gates <WH6607> shall lament <WH578> and mourn; <WH56> and she being desolate <WH5352> shall sit <WH3427> on the ground. <WH776>
